plain: The user's favourite genre is likely to be romantic comedy, as many of the movies they listed fall into that category. Their favourite mood for the musical score is likely to be uplifting and optimistic. Their favourite setting is likely to be a combination of modern and historical, with a focus on familiar locations and time periods. Their favourite visual style is likely to be a combination of realistic and animated, with a focus on creating a whimsical and imaginative world. Their favourite writing style is likely to be a combination of humour and heart, with a focus on creating relatable and likable characters. Their favourite runtime is likely to be between 90 and 120 minutes, as many of the movies they listed fall within that range. Their favourite themes are likely to be love, friendship, and self-discovery.
